post.body: Just finished upgrading my home server rack. The cable management took forever, but the airflow is finally optimized.
The sourdough starter is finally bubbling! Does anyone have a good hydration ratio for a crustier loaf?
Hiking the Appalachian trail this weekend. The weather forecast looks clear, but I'm packing extra rain gear just in case.
The new RPG release has incredible graphics, but the storyline feels a bit linear compared to the prequel.
Market volatility is high this week. It might be a good time to look into defensive stocks or just hold cash.
Reading about the history of currency standards. It is fascinating how economies transitioned from gold to fiat.
My tomato plants are showing signs of early blight. Trying a copper fungicide solution today.
Just booked a flight to Tokyo! I have been saving for this trip for two years. Recommendations needed.
Switching from acrylics to oil paints. The blending is so much smoother, but the drying time requires patience.
Trying to debug this Python script. I keep getting an indentation error on line 42 despite everything looking aligned.
Adopting a rescue dog was the best decision. He is a mix of Lab and something else, very energetic!
The narrative complexity of 'Dune' is unmatched. Herbert really understood how to build a universe.
Running my first 10k tomorrow. I have been training for months, hoping to finish under an hour.
Meal prepping for the week. Lots of chicken, rice, and broccoli. Boring but effective.
